title: [Highpark, Fairview Circle]
description: An ornamental pond occupies the northeast edge of the sculptured gardens, its surface almost covered with water lilies.  From its center, a statue of a fish spouts a fountain of water, throwing off rainbows in the light.  A row of statues opposite it carry on the aquatic theme, displaying forms of leaping dolphins and curled seahorses.

An ornamental pond occupies the northeast edge of the sculptured gardens, its surface almost covered with water lilies.  From its center, a statue of a fish spouts a fountain of water, its gentle patter accenting the moonlight.  A row of statues opposite it carry on the aquatic theme, displaying forms of leaping dolphins and curled seahorses.
